profile.name: Jane Doe
profile.summary: Experienced software engineer with 5+ years in full-stack development

achievements.title: Led migration to microservices architecture
achievements.description: Led a team of 5 engineers to migrate monolithic application to microservices, improving system scalability and reducing deployment time
achievements.impact: Reduced deployment time from 2 hours to 15 minutes

achievements.title: Developed real-time analytics dashboard
achievements.description: Built a real-time analytics dashboard using React and WebSockets to visualize user behavior and system metrics
achievements.impact: Enabled data-driven decision making for product team
achievements.metrics: Processing 10K+ events per second, used by 50+ stakeholders

achievements.title: Optimized database queries for performance
achievements.description: Identified and optimized slow database queries, implemented caching strategies, and redesigned database schema
achievements.metrics: Reduced average query time from 500ms to 150ms

achievements.title: Implemented CI/CD pipeline
achievements.description: Designed and implemented automated CI/CD pipeline using GitHub Actions, reducing manual deployment efforts

achievements.title: Mentored junior developers
achievements.description: Mentored 3 junior developers through code reviews, pair programming sessions, and technical guidance
achievements.metrics: Conducted 50+ code reviews, 20+ pair programming sessions
